name: Akwinduu Chapaa
description: Chapaa patties in mushroom gravy, served with roast potatoes. Invented by a wealthy Akwinduu chef and loved by fancy people worldwide.

name: Apple Pie
description: An apple pie made with heartwarming spices. A Daiya family recipe specially created to beat those snobs in Harvest Meadows.
recipe_obtain: Delaila and Badruu's Room • Delaila's Key

name: Bacon-Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Sautéed mushroom caps stuffed with bacon and tomato. A dish Delaila used to win Badruu's heart.

name: Bean Burger
description: A burger for the health-conscious... or just the bean lover!

name: Blueberry Pie
description: A pie with a sweet and tangy blueberry filling, perfect for a summer picnic.

name: Bouillabaisse
description: A rich seafood stew, served with potatoes and bread. Perhaps ancient humans once enjoyed this.

name: Celebration Cake
description: Delicious, decorated, and designed for special occasions, it's a piece of cake to make this pretty cake. Just do the cooking by the book.

name: Chapaa Asada Tacos
description: Seasoned chapaa meat fresh off the grill, and thinly-chopped onions tucked snugly into a crispy corn tortilla. What's not to like?

name: Chapaa Masala
description: Tender cubes of chapaa meat cooked in a rich curry, garnished with fresh cream. For those who need more spice in their life.

name: Chapaa Onigiri
description: Bring home the taste of Maji Market by making these rice balls stuffed with buttery chapaa meat. They fit conveniently in your pockets!

name: Chili Oil Dumplings
description: Dumplings, except with chili oil to give each bite a nice fiery kick. Best enjoyed in anything but a white shirt.

name: Congee
description: Humble rice slow simmered over a fire until it turns into a soft porridge. Simple and hearty.

name: Crab Gumbo
description: The only thing better than crab is crab stewed with mouth-watering ingredients that give the dish a hint of salt, spice, and everything nice.

name: Crab Pot Pie
description: This pie has it all: a flaky, buttery crust, hearty stewed veggies, and an irresistibly decadent crab filling. Serve it at the dinner table, and your guests will be singing your praises for years to come.

name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
description: Mushroom soup packed with alliums and earthy flavors, thickened with cream. Jina's favorite brain food.
recipe_obtain: Hekla's Tent • Hekla's Key • Quest - Cheer Up

name: Cream of Tomato Soup
description: A tomato soup thickened with cream, served with a baguette. Seems like Reth may be trying something new.

name: Creamy Carrot Soup
description: A yummy, cream soup guaranteed to use up all your carrots. If you didn't feed them to the ormuu already.

name: Elderwood Pie
description: A savory pie made from ingredients native to the Elderwood. Little Bumble's favorite!

name: Fish Stew
description: A basic fish stock seasoned with garlic and spices. Buffs fishing reticle speed for a short time.
recipe_obtain: Fishing from Bahari Coast using a Worm

name: Fish Tacos
description: Loaded with perfectly seasoned fish, these crunchy tacos will have you jumping over the moons.

name: Flowtato Fries with Ketchup
description: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, with homemade tangy ketchup.

name: Fried Catfish Dinner
description: Battered, fried catfish served with a fresh, tomato salsa. Taylin's favorite weeknight dish for picky children.

name: Fruit Smoothie Bowl
description: A popular breakfast in Akwinduu for how easy it is to customize!
recipe_obtain: Nai'o and Auni's Room • Nai'o's Key

name: Grilled Fish
description: Grill fish on a fire, and you've got food.

name: Grilled Meat
description: When heat grills meat, you've got a great meal.

name: Grilled Mushroom
description: Munch on these mushrooms grilled over a campfire.

name: Grilled Oyster
description: Oysters grilled over an open fire, no oven needed!

name: Hearty Vegetable Soup
description: A classic Kilima soup packed with foraged mushrooms and farm-fresh vegetables, made any way you like.

name: Hot Hounds
description: A freshly-cooked sausage drizzled in sauce and wrapped in a toasty bread bun. Eat it while it's hot!

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: Take your tastebuds on an adventure of a lifetime with a hot bowl of kimchi fried rice. Its strong and addicting flavors will have you wanting seconds.

name: Loaded Flowtato
description: This Loaded Flowtato is the perfect side dish. Pick a big enough Flowtato and it can be an entire meal on its own!

name: Loaded Potato Soup
description: A dense, potato soup packed with filling bacon. Najuma's treat for her father after a long day in the mines.

name: Lucky Braised Fish
description: A whole fish, braised in a savory deep-colored soy sauce and topped with ginger and scallions. Enjoy it during Luna New Year for an abundance of good luck.

name: Macaron
description: Light, delicate cookie sandwiches filled with buttercream. It's hard to eat just one.

name: Meaty Stir Fry
description: A healthy mix of sautéed meat and vegetables, served with rice. Still filled with the heat of the wok even after it's served.

name: Mushroom Dumpling Soup
description: Not only is mushroom dumpling soup good for your health, but soothing for the soul, too. One steaming bowl will leave you feeling rejuvenated.

name: Mushroom Quiche
description: A savory quiche. The mushrooms complement the cheese perfectly.

name: Muujin Bahari
description: A rich, meaty, sumptuous dish that was the favorite of Baron Hepzikiah von Bahari. Legend tells he would eat five a day, every day, and nothing else. Historians remain divided on what role, if any, this diet had in the massive heart attack that claimed his life at the tragically young age of 27.

name: Oysters Akwinduu
description: Spiced veggies and meat baked on the half shell. Recently voted 'Most inefficient way to eat bacon' by Stew & Brine Magazine.

name: Palian Onion Soup
description: Simple soup using a base of garlic and caramelized onions, often made by Eshe's childhood housekeeper.

name: Pan Fried Dumplings
description: Crispy, juicy, and tasty, these mouth-watering dumplings are fried to crispy perfection. Best enjoyed with a dipping sauce.

name: Petit Fives
description: A bite-sized morsel of cloying joy. Neat as a pin, these delicacies were designed by the oddly geometrical chef John Petit. It's a waste of cake, but the man loved his pentagons.

name: Phoenixfire Relleno
description: A spicy pepper, coated with egg and stuffed with your choice of meat. A single bite will have you working up a sweat! Or send you straight to the nearest clinic.

name: Poke Bowl
description: A colorful Maji Market delicacy of raw fish, vegetables, and spices. Popular in Inyrevn due to the region's abundance of fresh seafood.

name: Pumpkin Curry and Rice
description: This curry boasts a complex flavor profile thanks to its secret ingredient, Kopaa Nuts! Somehow tastes even better the day after you make it.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: In Kilima this is a popular seasonal pie during the brisk autumn months, but in Umbraa it's eaten year-round.

name: Pumpkin Stew
description: A spicy stew made from fresh pumpkin and hearty chunks of meat. Guaranteed to leave you satisfied.

name: Quiche Caleri
description: A protein-packed breakfast quiche from Caleri's personal recipe book. Enough meat and eggs to keep you going all day... especially when dealing with dog-eared pages and unreturned books.

name: Ramen
description: Hand-pulled noodles in garlic broth, topped with soft-boiled egg and mushrooms. Can be served in a cup.

name: Rice Cake Soup
description: Unwind after a long day with a hearty bowl of rice cake soup and its delightfully chewy and crunchy textures.

name: Rice Cake Stir Fry
description: Embrace the wonderful world of stir fry with a fresh serving of stir fried rice cake, and all of the veggie goodness that comes along with it.

name: Sashimi
description: A minimal meal of slices of raw fish, with a side of plain rice. Buffs fishing rod health for a short time.
recipe_obtain: Fishing from Bahari Rivers without bait

name: Sernuk Noodle Stew
description: An army stew traditionally made with foraged vegetables. Civilian chefs elevated it with spices and noodles.

name: Shepp's Pie
description: This pie might look simple, but it is anything but. Packed with juicy chapaa meat and a savory mix of seasoned vegetables, this bad boy is an explosion of flavor in each bite.

name: Soon Tofu
description: Extra soft, silky tofu is the main ingredient of this dish. Each spoonful practically melts in your mouth, and the mild flavor helps cut the spice of the soup base.

name: Spicy Crab Fried Rice
description: Did a crab fry this rice? Probably not, but a spicy one certainly did make it into this dish, which is as fulfilling as it is fragrant.

name: Spicy Honey-Baked Muujin
description: The centerpiece of any self-respecting Palian stateswoman's feast.

name: Spicy Rice Cakes
description: Chewy and flavorful, these rice cakes are stir-fried in a specialty sauce packed with just the right amount of spice. Ancient Humans were said to share this dish at the dinner table together.

name: Spicy Stir Fry
description: A flaming hot twist to traditional stir fry, this dish will have you thirsty for seconds and a glass of cold water.

name: Steak Dinner
description: Steak seared in herb butter, served with a baguette. This versatile recipe adapts easily to most meats.

name: Steamed Fish
description: Steamed whole and flavored with ginger, scallions, and soy sauce, this fish makes for a savory yet light meal. Enjoy it during Luna New Year for an abundance of good luck.

name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
description: Simple yet tasty, these cabbage rolls are stuffed with flavor and make the perfect bite-sized snacks. Drizzle sauce on them for extra enjoyment.

name: Stuffed Tomatoes
description: Tomatoes in butter, stuffed with their own, spiced, innards. Don't think too hard about it.

name: Sushi
description: A pleasant meal of seasoned rice topped with raw fish, garnished with spices. Buffs fishing rod health for a short time.
recipe_obtain: Fishing from Ponds using a Glow Worm

name: Trout Dinner
description: Garlic-seared trout with potatoes, created so ancient humans could share Einar's love of fishing. Hook fish more quickly for a short time.

name: Veggie Chili
description: Various nations of the Palian Republic have their own version of this popular dish, but in Umbraa there's only one rule: it HAS to have beans.

name: Veggie Fried Rice
description: Rice and vegetables fried in a pan with fresh eggs, making a savory main or side dish. Also a great way to use up leftovers.
